title: R1dwanRz
author: R1dwanRz
content: I've been playing the game LifeAfter and it really gives me a good sense of what an apocalypse might be like. I tried playing Undawn too, but didn't enjoy it as much as LifeAfter. I want to try more games like this. Do you play any other apocalypse-themed games apart from these two?

comments.author: rybako
comments.body: I love the Fallout series. Wasteland 3 and Mad Max are also pretty good. Oh, and also Metro Exodus.
